sentence.Network_en: To aver is to allege in a pleading.
sentence.Network_cn: 立证是在辩护中引例证明.

sentence.Network_en: In spite of all you say, I still aver that his report is true.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管你怎么说, 我还是断言他的报告是真实的.

sentence.Network_en: A kindly aver will never make a good horse.
sentence.Network_cn: 天生负重之马成不了良骑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... avenge v. 为„复仇,为„报仇 aver v. 极力声明,断言 averse adj. 厌恶的,反对的.
...擎从网络抓取汇总形成的快照结果，一兜网为您找到2条圆刚（Aver）双模高清数字TV棒 A850（国标高清+DVB-T，笔记本/台式机 …
《Friends》词汇表A ... Semi-Actie Laster, 半主动激光器 aver vt. 断言, 主张 pinch n. 捏, 撮, 收缩, 紧急关头, 匮乏, 压力.
availability 可用性；有效性；效力aver 确证；证明；断言averment 事实的陈述

list.abs: I aver it will not rain tomorrow ., 我断言明天不会下雨.
还有一些使用avere的短语,和法语蛮像的:  avere fame 感到饥饿  avere sete 感到口渴  avere caldo 感到暖和  avere freddo 感到寒冷  avere fretta 匆忙.
cake_半堂 shufa_百度空间 ... antimony cake 锑饼 aver cake 燕麦饼 banbury cake 班伯里加料夹心饼.
natural death 死于自然negative averment 否定的声言neglect of duty 疏忽职守

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'declare or confirm to be true'): from Old French averer, based on Latin ad 'to' (implying 'cause to be') + verus 'true'

entry.def: If you aver that something is the case, you say very firmly that it is true.

example.ex: He avers that chaos will erupt if he loses...
example.tran: 他断言，如果他失败将会爆发动乱。

example.ex: 'Enter-taining is something that everyone in the country can enjoy,' she averred.
example.tran: “娱乐消遣是每个国民都能享受的事，”她坚定地说。

sentences.sentence: "He alleged that he was the victim of a crime"
"He said it was too late to intervene in the war"
"The registrar says that I owe the school money"

means.word_mean: 2. to declare or affirm solemnly and formally as true;

sentences.sentence: "Before God I swear I am innocent"

auth_sentence.content: A brilliant matrimonial prize for which, as all chroniclers aver, there had been many competitors.
auth_sentence.res_content: A brilliant matrimonial prize for which, as all chroniclers aver, there had been many competitors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A brilliant matrimonial prize for which, as all chroniclers aver, there had been many competitors.

auth_sentence.content: And managers will aver, the early stages of any organization affect its ultimate character.
auth_sentence.res_content: And managers will aver, the early stages of any organization affect its ultimate character.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And managers will aver, the early stages of any organization affect its ultimate character.

auth_sentence.content: If it was truly a minority as you aver, then they would not have done anything - or perhaps would've just banned people.
auth_sentence.res_content: If it was truly a minority as you aver, then they would not have done anything - or perhaps would've just banned people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If it was truly a minority as you aver, then they would not have done anything - or perhaps would've just banned people.
